trash.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc
trash.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Will someone take out the trash  (=take it outside the house)?
Just put it in the trash.
trash.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something that is of very poor quality
trash.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: How can you read that trash?
trash.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone from a low social class who you do not respect because you think they are lazy or immoral
trash.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to destroy something completely, either deliberately or by using it too much
trash.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The place got trashed last time we had a party.
trash.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to criticize someone or something very severely
trash.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The researchers are angry that attempts have been made to trash their work.
